thread.title: DANIEL
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by DANIEL

author: DANIEL
title: DANIEL
text:
I have dealt with Red Spot since their entry into the hire car market too long ago to recount. I have never had anything but professional service from the team. Their Top Dog level is I believe the greatest policy going and provides complete piece of mind knowing that there are no hidden costs in the event of an accident. The introduction of the fuel option is also a benefit as it allows me to just pick up the vehicle and drop off when completed knowing there is nothing more to pay.
Thank
Red Spot
